Posts.Content: Razin3rats wrote: I live life like each day matters. I take each trial with the realization it will make me stronger. Since birth my life has been one trial after another and now this. I don't want to be a quitter, and i don't want to dissappoint my God, but I'm tired of fighting at every turn. I'm just so tired, emotionally and physically. I'm ready to let go and move on to a better promise than what we have here. Where life is not one trial after another, one let down after another. I'm just not prepare for another crises. All my hope has been sucked out of me and i don't know where I misplaced it. Karen Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: flat hard lump, size of quarter, ujst under the skin Razin3rats LaurenN
